isis.stitle: ELECTRICAL SYSTEM TROUBLESHOOTING GUIDE - 9800 - CAB: 5000, 9100, 9200, 9300, 9400 - DESCRIPTION

svcsubsecinfo.para: The cab for 5000 and 9000 Series premium conventional and 9000 Series Pro Sleeper models is made of aluminum to resist corrosion and to reduce vehicle weight ( Figure 1). Riveted construction adds strength and improves repairability over the 100% welded cabs. Structural sealers increase joint strength.

The combination of riveted construction and adhesive sealers provides a much tighter fitting cab than conventional welded steel, which eliminates air leaks, reduces road noise and improves driver comfort.

Figure 2 shows the 5000 and 9000 Series cabs. The Pro Sleeper cab is available on the 9000 Series only. The Pro Sleeper has two different cab sizes, the 97-inch (51-inch sleeper) and the 118-inch (72-inch sleeper) BBC (bumper to back of cab). The Pro Sleeper also has two different roof designs: Flat Roof and Raised Roof.
